name: Intuitive Crafting
summary: Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan.
description:
Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting (or another skill of your choice, if you're already trained in Crafting). You gain the Specialty Crafting skill feat in a specialty of your choice.Traits

Aphorite: A type of planar scion descended from a being from Axis, the Plane of Law.
